findings.title: Skill does not specify a license
findings.description: Skill manifest does not include a 'license' field. Specifying a license helps users understand usage terms.
findings.remediation: Add 'license' field to SKILL.md frontmatter (e.g., MIT, Apache-2.0)

findings.title: Skill description is too short
findings.description: Description has only 0 words. Short descriptions may not provide enough context for the agent to determine when this skill should be used.
findings.remediation: Expand the description to at least 10-20 words explaining the skill's purpose, capabilities, and appropriate use cases.
